text: Ekhana'o ki samaya haya ni tadera jan'ya ye yara bisbasa kare tadera hrdaya binata habe allahâ€Œra smarane ebam satyera ya abatirna hayeche? Ara tara odera mato na hoka yadera purbabartikale grantha de'oya hayechila, kinta samaya tadera jan'ya sudirgha mane hayechila, phale tadera hrdaya kathina haye parechila. Ara tadera madhyera aneke'i hayechila satyatyagi.
